segment.source: Determining why a Device Receives a Noncompliance Message
segment.target: Determining why a Device Receives a Noncompliance Message

segment.source: Determining why a Device Receives a Noncompliance Message
segment.target: Determining why a Device Receives a Noncompliance Message

segment.source: Determining why a Device Receives a Noncompliance Message
segment.target: Determining why a Device Receives a Noncompliance Message

segment.source: The following noncompliance codes are provided by WMI and describe the reasons why a particular device is reported by MBAM as noncompliant.
segment.target: The following noncompliance codes are provided by WMI and describe the reasons why a particular device is reported by MBAM as noncompliant.

segment.source: You can use your preferred method to view WMI.
segment.target: You can use your preferred method to view WMI.

segment.source: If you use PowerShell, run from a PowerShell prompt and search for ReasonsForNoncompliance.
segment.target: If you use PowerShell, run from a PowerShell prompt and search for ReasonsForNoncompliance.

segment.source: Non-Compliance Code
segment.target: Non-Compliance Code

segment.source: Reason for Non-Compliance
segment.target: Reason for Non-Compliance

segment.source: Cipher strength not AES 256.
segment.target: Cipher strength not AES 256.

segment.source: MBAM Policy requires this volume to be encrypted but it is not.
segment.target: MBAM Policy requires this volume to be encrypted but it is not.

segment.source: MBAM Policy requires this volume to NOT be encrypted, but it is.
segment.target: MBAM Policy requires this volume to NOT be encrypted, but it is.

segment.source: MBAM Policy requires this volume use a TPM protector, but it does not.
segment.target: MBAM Policy requires this volume use a TPM protector, but it does not.

segment.source: MBAM Policy requires this volume use a TPM+PIN protector, but it does not.
segment.target: MBAM Policy requires this volume use a TPM+PIN protector, but it does not.

segment.source: MBAM Policy does not allow non TPM machines to report as compliant.
segment.target: MBAM Policy does not allow non TPM machines to report as compliant.

segment.source: Volume has a TPM protector but the TPM is not visible (booted with recover key after disabling TPM in BIOS?).
segment.target: Volume has a TPM protector but the TPM is not visible (booted with recover key after disabling TPM in BIOS?).

segment.source: MBAM Policy requires this volume use a password protector, but it does not have one.
segment.target: MBAM Policy requires this volume use a password protector, but it does not have one.

segment.source: MBAM Policy requires this volume NOT use a password protector, but it has one.
segment.target: MBAM Policy requires this volume NOT use a password protector, but it has one.

segment.source: MBAM Policy requires this volume use an auto-unlock protector, but it does not have one.
segment.target: MBAM Policy requires this volume use an auto-unlock protector, but it does not have one.

segment.source: MBAM Policy requires this volume NOT use an auto-unlock protector, but it has one.
segment.target: MBAM Policy requires this volume NOT use an auto-unlock protector, but it has one.

segment.source: Policy conflict detected preventing MBAM from reporting this volume as compliant.
segment.target: Policy conflict detected preventing MBAM from reporting this volume as compliant.

segment.source: A system volume is needed to encrypt the OS volume but it is not present.
segment.target: A system volume is needed to encrypt the OS volume but it is not present.

segment.source: Protection is suspended for the volume.
segment.target: Protection is suspended for the volume.

segment.source: AutoUnlock unsafe unless the OS volume is encrypted.
segment.target: AutoUnlock unsafe unless the OS volume is encrypted.

segment.source: Got a suggestion for MBAM?
segment.target: Got a suggestion for MBAM?

segment.source: Add or vote on suggestions here.
segment.target: Add or vote on suggestions here.

segment.source: For MBAM issues, use the MBAM TechNet Forum.
segment.target: For MBAM issues, use the MBAM TechNet Forum.
